title: im getting leaverbuster for no reason idk why i dont leave games?
body: i keep on getting leaver buster every time i look for a game ?

replies.body:
It sounds really strange that you would receive a lower priority for no reason, so I looked into this for you.  I discovered that there were a few leaves that resulted in a leaverbuster, and I'd like to clear some things up.  [Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)is enabled on any matchmade games, even if it's a normal game or an AI vs Coop. 

There are still others in the match with you, and leaving causes these players a negative experience.  If you are having any issues consistently playing without interruptions, I'd like to help.  Otherwise, I hope that helps clear things up!
